title.native: 新米錬金術師の店舗経営

description:
Orphaned Sarasa just graduated from the Royal Alchemist Academy, and that means her longed-for life of elegance and riches is close at hand! As a graduation gift, her teacher gifts her a house to set up shop — but Sarasa’s dilapidated new digs are beyond far-flung. What’s a novice alchemist to do when they're stuck in the middle of nowhere with a business to run and supplies to gather from a very dangerous natural world? Whether it’s facing down frightening fantasy creatures or finding creative ways to attract customers, Sarasa has her work cut out for her as she achieves her dream of becoming the greatest alchemist around!

(Source: HIDIVE)
synonyms: Management of Novice Alchemist: Get My Shop!

node.description:
[Official Website](http://fuumi.ukime.org/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/fuumiisc) | [Pixiv](http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=10292) | [Tumblr](https://fuumiis.tumblr.com/)

Fuumi is a Japanese illustrator. She is also the character designer for Hololive 4th generation VTuber [Tsunomaki Watame](https://anilist.co/staff/206006/Watame-Tsunomaki).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/aho_boy)

Hiroshi Ikehata is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

Harumi Fuuki is a Japanese composer and pianist affiliated with Inspire Holdings. She graduated from a national music college in the composition department as the top student.

Her works include music for television dramas, movies, commercials, stage plays, radio programs and anime.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三嶋章夫)

Affiliated with King Records.

__Nicknames:__ Suwawa (すわわ), Osuwa (おすわ), Suwa-chan (すわちゃん)
__Height:__ 157cm

[Website (Columbia)](https://columbia.jp/suwananaka/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/suwananaka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/n.suwawagram/)
Also is a writer, producer and director for ADV Films and Robotboy Films.
